actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 12 (2d8+3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing and Smell
special_abilities.desc: The wolf's Perception is 18 when perceiving by hearing or smell.

special_abilities.name: Pack Tactics
special_abilities.desc: The wolf has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wolf's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
